name: jira-ticket-to-url
title: Jira Ticket to URL
description: Convert a Jira ticket (e.g. SF-8088) into a URL (e.g. https://mycompany.atlassian.net/browse/SF-8088).
author: salcode

commands.name: pasteMarkdownUrl
commands.title: Jira Markdown URL Paste
commands.subtitle: Convert Jira ticket to Markdown URL and paste
commands.description: Convert Jira Ticket to URL (e.g. SF-8088) to (e.g. [SF-8088](https://mycompany.atlassian.net/browse/SF-8088)) and paste the URL in the current application

commands.name: pasteUrl
commands.title: Jira URL Paste
commands.subtitle: Convert Jira ticket to URL and paste
commands.description: Convert Jira Ticket to URL (e.g. SF-8088) to (e.g. https://mycompany.atlassian.net/browse/SF-8088) and paste the URL in the current application

commands.name: openUrl
commands.title: Jira Visit Ticket URL
commands.subtitle: Open URL for the Jira ticket
commands.description: Prompts the user for a Jira ticket (e.g. SF-8088) and opens the URL that goes with the ticket (e.g. https://mycompany.atlassian.net/browse/SF-8088)
